word_mean: 血红素：铁与卟啉上4个吡咯基的配位蝥合物，进一步再由蝥合的铁是Fe(Ⅱ)还是Fe(Ⅲ)而区别为〔亚铁〕血红素和高铁血红素。4个卟啉配体形成一平面复体，铁原子第5、6配位与卟啉面垂直，二者皆可有强场配体占有，如细胞色素是蛋白上组氨酸残基的一个氮原子，也可能只占其一，如血红蛋白的第6位是与氧可逆结合的

sentence.Network_en: This structure is called the heme group.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一结构叫做血红素基因.

sentence.Network_en: A conjugated protein, such as hemoglobin , that contains a colored , metal - containing prosthetic group, such as heme.
sentence.Network_cn: 从血色素中除去亚铁血红素而获得的一种无色蛋白质.

sentence.Network_en: Cytochrome P 450 s are a large group of heme - binding enzymes and widely distribute in biology.
sentence.Network_cn: 细胞色素P450是一种血红素结合蛋白,在生物界广泛存在.

auth_sentence.content: The heme iron found in meat is absorbed at a very high rate and causes iron excess which causes endocrine disruption.

auth_sentence.content: Next, the body makes a molecule to clean up leaky heme, but in the mice, as heme levels rose, levels of that hemopexin dropped.
